name: Roku 55" Select Series 4K HDR Smart TV (2025 Model)
audio: Built-in Speakers with Clear Speech & Bluetooth Headphone Mode
pros: Extremely user-friendly and intuitive Roku OS interface
Excellent value for a 4K smart TV
Surprisingly good sound quality for built-in speakers
Access to a huge library of free content via The Roku Channel
Seamless integration with popular voice assistants (Alexa, Google, Siri)
cons: Lacks advanced gaming features (no VRR, ALLM)
Basic HDR support (HDR10 only, no Dolby Vision or HDR10+)
Design and build quality are functional but not premium
60Hz refresh rate may not be ideal for fast-action sports or gaming
